articles.author: Nicole Winfield
articles.title: Pope Francis, first Latin American pontiff who ministered with a charming, humble style, dies at 88 - AP News
articles.description: Pope Francis has died at age 88. The first Latin American pontiff charmed the world with his humble style and concern for the poor. But he alienated conservatives with critiques of capitalism and climate change. From his election, the Argentine-born Jorge Mar…
articles.content: VATICAN CITY (AP) Pope Francis, historys first Latin American pontiff who charmed the world with his humble style and concern for the poor but alienated conservatives with critiques of capitalism and… [+21671 chars]
